about.title: About Me
about.description: My name is Juan Pablo RÃ­os Escobar, I'm an engineer, passionate about solving problems and bringing new things to real life. As a developer I found a way to do both, thats why I love it. With me you can be confident that I will do my best to get to your goals. I can automate your task, collect data, develop and manage data bases, analise and organise data, develop Android native and Web apps both frontend and backend side.

webDev: I will do responsive web apps using MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React.js, Node.js).
webScraping: I will scrap any web page with Python and store the records as .json, .txt, .csv or in a database as well.
databases: I will create and manage SQL and NoSQL databases with MySQ, MariaDB or MongoDb.
androidApps: I will develop Android native apps using Kotlin or Java with Android Studio or React Native.
macros: I will develop Microsoft Office and Google Apps macros to automate task.

portfolio: Adopt a Friend, page to find and adopt a pet, in process...
